input: WITH dept_costs AS (SELECT department_id, SUM(test_amt) AS total_sal FROM employees GROUP BY department_id) SELECT * FROM dept_costs WHERE total_sal > (SELECT AVG(total_sal) FROM dept_costs);

outputs.expected: WITH dept_costs AS ( SELECT department_id, SUM ( test_amt ) FROM employees GROUP BY department_id ) SELECT * FROM dept_costs WHERE total_sal > ( SELECT AVG ( total_sal ) FROM dept_costs )
WITH dept_costs AS (SELECT department_id, SUM(test_amt) FROM employees GROUP BY department_id) SELECT * FROM dept_costs WHERE total_sal > (SELECT AVG(total_sal) FROM dept_costs);
